text_block_list.text:
Splendid accomplishments come in
many forms, but— I find guiding your
horsegirl to a beautiful future most
praiseworthy of all.

Fostering a close bond, peaceful and
safe, making your dreams come true
together— If only small, you can count
on my support to live through your days
like that.

Now that your outlook looks blessed… 
perhaps some sort of miracle will come!
